areas.name: London eye
areas.description: Tour the impressive Edinburgh Castle which looms high over the city.

areas.name: Ashmolean Museum
areas.description: Aims to present the story of the human race over thousands of years.

areas.name: Buckingham Palace
areas.description: The palace has been at the center of Royal Life in London since 1837.

areas.name: Tower Bridge
areas.description: Tower Bridge is the grandest and most distinctive of the Thames River crossings.

areas.name: Oxford's Museum of Natural History
areas.description: Founded in 1860 as a place to showcase all the scientific study conducted at Oxford University.

areas.name: Oxford Botanic Garden
areas.description: over 400 years old, the oldest botanic garden in the entire United Kingdom, and houses over 5,000 different plant species.

areas.name: The Shard
areas.description: The Shard towers more than 80 stories over the city.

areas.name: The Bodleian Library
areas.description: One the oldest libraries in all of Europe and the second biggest in the Uk.
